Name: New Vandenburg Uprising
Details: The New Vandenburg uprising begun in 2765 when 18 Taurian worlds declared its independence from the Star League, following decades of economic exploitation of the Periphery. As a response, the First Lord Richard Cameron ordered General Kerensky to put down the rebellion using the SLDF, which deployed in masse to stamp out the insurgents. The uprising is considered to mark the beginning of the Amaris Civil War, as it was orchestrated by Stephan Amaris as part of his coup against the Star League.
